attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Have you ever been to a school and listened to a teacher tell you to just do what YOU want and be INDIVIDUAL?

Well how can People be individual when they all look like robots?

People work more confortably in there own clothes the more relaxed they are the more calm they will be.

im sick of seeing everyone look exacually the same and want the kids and teenagers to be able to express them selves in there own way! And its not just clothes, we should get to wear clothes we normally would and let let our hair down abit, literally Have it our style Obiviusly not to the exstent where they can hurt themself, but a bit more freedom yeah ? 

WE HAVE A RIGHT TO BE WHAT WE WANT

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
